item.title: Dungeoneering armour models and cape! and cool partyhat REP++ plz
item.dc:creator: @orcashark orcashark
item.description:
@orcashark wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I, post:2, topic:351588”][quote author=dylan_0789 link=topic=447648.msg3299387#msg3299387 date=1281191858]
Honestly, I don’t know what the big thing over rep is… It doesn’t actually determine anything. Especially seeing as now anyone and everyone rep++ anyone and everyone for anything and everything… If you get what I’m saying. Don’t worry about gaining reputation because you don’t actually gain anything from it except a different number of reputation points…
More on topic: instead of leeching Jagex and your ‘buds’ work, why not take some time and actually learn to model and who knows, if you get good enough Jagex might even leech your work (sarcasm by the way). Dont let a bunch of rep-- get you down because quite honestly, it has no effect on anything what so ever.
[/quote]Rep = Cool.
0 rep = Not cool.
200 rep = Really cool.
I Vain I = Sexy.
I Vain I + 200 rep = Really fucking sexy&cool.

Other fucking sexy & cool people: CoonHunter, Krackkid, Natey, MITB, Orcashark and…Anyone else.[/quote]

LOL, Agreed to all. -Tad of Sarcasm-

To me i just like to have rep because for some reason people with 200 rep get more respect then others :S

But that’s just me

nesc:

ok i did leech them all i got the coloured partyhat from my m8s game i took it off the client and now h1 skiller saying its yours its not! i just need to know how to make models idk how to even recolour it dont show like a pencil to edit it! or anything …

Ty for the new sig

Read full topic

item.title: Dungeoneering armour models and cape! and cool partyhat REP++ plz
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

Honestly, I don’t know what the big thing over rep is… It doesn’t actually determine anything. Especially seeing as now anyone and everyone rep++ anyone and everyone for anything and everything… If you get what I’m saying. Don’t worry about gaining reputation because you don’t actually gain anything from it except a different number of reputation points…
More on topic: instead of leeching Jagex and your ‘buds’ work, why not take some time and actually learn to model and who knows, if you get good enough Jagex might even leech your work (sarcasm by the way). Dont let a bunch of rep-- get you down because quite honestly, it has no effect on anything what so ever.

item.title: Dungeoneering armour models and cape! and cool partyhat REP++ plz
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:15, topic:351288”]RSPS’s aren’t illegal if you use Hyperon (or rewrite the stream.class)

The only way it can be illegal is if you start hosting using their client. (which we do on a daily basis)

The server however, isn’t illegal.[/quote]Common misconception. Jagex owns the client/server communication protocol. Which is implemented into every server. It counts as intellectual property. If they wanted to they could argue that.

Read full topic

item.title: Dungeoneering armour models and cape! and cool partyhat REP++ plz
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

Yes, you might be very smart by stealing models from jagex. But then again as said many times before, it isn’t your work.
I don’t mind you asking for rep, so I just gave you it (rep–). The coloured phat, however, is very creative. You would of actually got rep if you posted the coloured phat as your first attempt. And that only, if you didn’t ask for rep.

Read full topic

item.title: Dungeoneering armour models and cape! and cool partyhat REP++ plz
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

RSPS’s aren’t illegal if you use Hyperon (or rewrite the stream.class)

The only way it can be illegal is if you start hosting using their client. (which we do on a daily basis)

The server however, isn’t illegal.

item.title: Dungeoneering armour models and cape! and cool partyhat REP++ plz
item.dc:creator: @staypuff staypuff
item.description:
@staypuff wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:8, topic:351288”]Ok, I think it’s time for a little discussion on the model section, because it appears sarcasm is VERY alive here. (besides man_killer, who I think wants to rip this kids head off.)

  1. Nesc, rule 1, and always rule 1, DON’T STEAL OTHER PEOPLES WORK. Are you a fucking moron? Jagex could sue you, faggot.

the wanderer im good 1st time is always the best

No attempt to say that it was Jagex’s, and for the record, he was being sarcastic. But you took it as a compliment, being so full of yourself to the point where your ego controls your mind over what’s right and wrong.
2. We do not ask for rep here. Asking for rep is the equivalent of saying “I’m a gay fag who can’t get repped because all my shit sucks, so I’ll remind you to click a button you shouldn’t!”. When you ask for rep++, 9/10 times u get rep–.
3.DON’T STEAL WORK. EVEN WITH MAN_KILLERX, YOU SAID

man killer i didnt do anything and u cant tell me wut to do im helping out others, ok!

With that said, CJ, Frell, Archer, whoever, please lock this topic[/quote]

I agree in some parts of this… But WTF? Don’t steal models from jagex? They could sue you? What so tey will only sue you for taking models one at a time but it is Ok to steal their game and taking full credit for it after editing it a tiny amount? The whole rsps thing is breaking the law and is infinging copywrite laws. If you even have a rsps server or rs models on it comp, don’t go telling other people that they are retarded and will get sued.

Read full topic

the wanderer im good 1st time is always the best

No attempt to say that it was Jagex’s, and for the record, he was being sarcastic. But you took it as a compliment, being so full of yourself to the point where your ego controls your mind over what’s right and wrong.
2. We do not ask for rep here. Asking for rep is the equivalent of saying “I’m a gay fag who can’t get repped because all my shit sucks, so I’ll remind you to click a button you shouldn’t!”. When you ask for rep++, 9/10 times u get rep–.
3.DON’T STEAL WORK. EVEN WITH MAN_KILLERX, YOU SAID

nesc:

man killer i didnt do anything and u cant tell me wut to do im helping out others, ok!

With that said, CJ, Frell, Archer, whoever, please lock this topic
